title: Video to GIF
description: Converting video to gif through a palette.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: h264+aac
description: re'Encode to h264+aac into mp4 container.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Split mp4 VA streams
description: Extracting audio and video streams into individual containers without re-encoding

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Replace Audio
description: Removes the original audio stream and inserts a new one, repeating it in a loop until the video duration is filled.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Scale+Aspect
description: Resizing video with a user-defined aspect ratio.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: FPS Conversion
description: Modifying the output framerate of a video stream via the fps filter.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Trimming(No re'Encoding)
description: Modifying the output duration of a media via the -ss and -t flags.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Concatenation+Padding
description: Merges multiple video streams into a single output, adding padding as needed to match sizes.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Overlay
description: Adds an overlay to the video, active during a given time range and positioned at the bottom center.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Draw Text
description: Applies text overlays to video, supporting detailed customization of font, size, color, and positioning.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Crop
description: Applies a video crop operation with the crop area positioned relative to the center of the frame.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Get Rotated
description: Applies a rotation transform, allowing the video to be rotated to any angle.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Color Correction
description: Applies an equalizer to video, allowing fine-tuned control of brightness, contrast, saturation, and gamma levels.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Volume
description: Applies the volume filter to increase, decrease, or normalize the audio loudness.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: HDR to SDR
description: Performs HDR-to-SDR conversion with tone mapping and resizes the video to 1920×1080 (Full HD).

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Vertical to Horizontal
description: Transforms Vertical Video to Horizontal Format with Blur Effects.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Extract picture from a Video
description: This graph demonstrates how to extract a single frame (the 100th) from a video stream.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Denoise video
description: Implements a best-practice workflow for video denoising, using filters and techniques widely recommended by the FFmpeg community.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Chroma Key
description: Uses chroma keying to remove a background color and overlay the subject onto another video.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Remove metadata
description: Strips media files of metadata such as tags, titles, and encoding information.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Picture in Picture
description: Applies a picture-in-picture effect where the overlay media can use a custom mask shape, with an added shadow for visual depth.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Deinterlacing
description: Removes interlacing artifacts from video, converting it into smooth progressive frames.

title: MPEG DASH
description: Implements a base transcoding pipeline for generating MPEG-DASH output with adaptive bitrate streams at 1080p, 720p, and 480p resolutions.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: HTTP Live Streaming(HLS)
description: Implements a base transcoding pipeline for generating HLS output with adaptive bitrate streams at 1080p, 720p, and 480p resolutions.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: AVIF over GIF
description: Implements an AV1-based workflow to produce AVIF animations, offering superior compression and quality compared to traditional GIF formats.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: PNG2AVIF
description: Converts a PNG image to AVIF format using the libaom-av1 codec, showcasing efficient image compression with modern AV1 standards(Alpha preserved).

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: AV1
description: Demonstrates encoding video with the libaom-av1 codec, enabling efficient compression with modern AV1 standards.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Histogram
description: Adds a real-time histogram overlay to the video, showing per-channel color intensity and brightness levels.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Audio Waveform
description: Generates a visual representation of the audio waveform, displaying amplitude variations over time.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Chromatic Aberration
description: Provides a simple example of chromatic aberration by separating color channels, altering per-channel data, and merging them back into a final video.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: HEVC Master
description: Optimizes your videos using the H.265/HEVC codec for maximum compression without sacrificing visual quality.

title: OpenAI Whisper
description: Demonstrates how to use OpenAI Whisper to transcribe speech from audio or video content into text.

title: Multiple SRT Subtitles
description: Shows how to add multiple SRT subtitle files to a video into an MKV container without re-encoding.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: LUT (cube file)
description: Uses LUTs defined in cube files to adjust and enhance video colors for professional color grading.

title: Strict DVD (NTSC / AC3)
description: Fully DVD-compliant MPEG-2 with Dolby Digital. Output 720x480 @ 29.97fps for North American DVD authoring or playback.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: Strict DVD (PAL / AC3)
description: Fully DVD-compliant PAL format. Encodes MPEG-2 video with AC-3 audio at 720x576 @ 25fps.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y

title: DVD (AC3)
description: DVD-compliant MPEG-2 video with Dolby Digital stereo audio.

nodes.type: ffmpeg/general/Global options (affect whole program instead of just one file):/-y
